meanings.definition: The act or process of adding color to a black-and-white image or film.
meanings.sent1: The colorization of the old movie made it more vibrant and engaging.
meanings.sent2: The colorization of the photograph brought out the beauty of the scenery.
meanings.sent3: The colorization of the classic film gave it a fresh and modern look.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic touch in the colorization of the painting transformed it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The colorization of the scene made it come alive with vivid hues.

meanings.definition: The result of adding color to a black-and-white image or film.
meanings.sent1: The colorization of the photo enhanced its visual appeal.
meanings.sent2: The colorization of the movie added depth and richness to the visuals.
meanings.sent3: The colorization of the artwork brought a pop of color to the room.
meanings.sent4: The colorization of the design gave it a modern and trendy look.
meanings.sent5: The colorization of the image made it stand out with vibrant colors.
